thread.title: Flavor Flav gets trial pushed to February
thread.title_full: Flavor Flav gets trial pushed to February | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News

author: The Associated Press
title: Flavor Flav gets trial pushed to February
text:
LAS VEGAS - Trial has been postponed to Feb. 8 for entertainer Flavor Flav on misdemeanour driving under the influence, speeding and cocaine charges stemming from a vehicle stop last May in Las Vegas.
Prosecutors and defence attorney Dayvid Figler said the new date allows time to try to resolve the case against the 56-year-old rapper and reality television star whose name is William Drayton Jr.
The Nevada Highway Patrol says the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductee was clocked going 87 mph in a 65 mph zone.
Drayton settled criminal charges this week in New York's Nassau County stemming from a traffic stop while racing to his mother's funeral on Long Island.
He pleaded guilty Tuesday to an unlicenced driver charge, was fined about $3,600 and sentenced to time already served.
Related Stories Flavor Flav pleads guilty over 2014 traffic stop while driving to mom's funeral Rapper Flavor Flav charged with DUI after arrest in May in Las Vegas
